Author: FeatherMahogany59
Text: Obviously there is no substitute for eating a healthy meal with protein and fiber that will keep you full and not cause a spike in blood sugar that will cause a crash....  But taking a fiber supplement with 16 oz of water after breakfast or lunch makes me feel totally satiated for hours, so I donâ€™t get that crash  partway through the day that causes a binge.

Author: algorthin
Text: This is very solidly in the realm asking for tips, so I'm gonna give you some other info: Caffeine based diet pills are supposed to work in 3 parts, as an appetite suppressant, to raise your energy so that you don't sit around all day, and as a diuretic.  My experience is that they all suck. There's another appetite suppressant, probably the only one that comes as a pill that actually works, which will fuck with the ability of medications to work, particularly SSRIs, but also others. None of them are a good plan for your health and as someone who has abused them, they're not the best way to lose weight anyway because as soon as you stop taking them your appetite comes back
